metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000101 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Mingw-w64 version 5.0.3 and earlier, 5.0.4, 6.0.0 and 7.0.0 contains anImproper Null Termination (CWE-170) vulnerability in mingw-w64-crt(libc)->(v)snprintf that can result in The bug may be used to corruptsubsequent string functions. This attack appear to be exploitable viaDepending on the usage, worst case: network.

criterions.comment: mingw-w64 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
